channel.title: Strange error when people connect
channel.description:
Connection from (ip) Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:11698) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:258)
o.O The owner himself can connect but this happens if others connect

item.title: Strange error when people connect
item.dc:creator: @nieksantol nieksantol
item.description:
@nieksantol wrote:

Connection from (ip)
Disconnecting bugged player null
java.lang.NullPointerException
at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36)
at client.logout(client.java:11698)
at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383)
at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:258)

o.O
The owner himself can connect but this happens if others connect

Read full topic
